categories.name: Cables
categories.description: High-quality electrical cables for various applications

categories.name: Wires
categories.description: Premium wires for residential and industrial use

products.name: Premium Industrial Cable
products.description: High-performance cable designed for industrial applications with superior durability
products.longDescription: Our Premium Industrial Cable is engineered to meet the most demanding industrial requirements. Features include enhanced insulation, superior conductivity, and exceptional durability in harsh environments. Ideal for manufacturing facilities, power plants, and heavy machinery installations.

products.name: Smart Touch Switch
products.description: Modern touch-sensitive switch with WiFi connectivity
products.longDescription: Experience the future of home control with our Smart Touch Switch. This elegant device combines sophisticated touch controls with smart home integration, allowing you to manage your lighting through voice commands or your smartphone. Features include customizable LED indicators, scheduling, and energy monitoring.

products.name: LED Panel Light
products.description: Energy-efficient LED panel with adjustable brightness
products.longDescription: Transform your space with our premium LED Panel Light. This ultra-thin panel delivers uniform, flicker-free illumination while consuming minimal energy. Perfect for offices, homes, and commercial spaces, it features adjustable brightness levels and can be surface-mounted or recessed.

faq.question: What types of cables do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer a wide range of cables including power cables, control cables, instrumentation cables, and specialty cables for various industrial and commercial applications.

faq.question: Are your products certified?
faq.answer: Yes, all our products are certified by relevant authorities and comply with international safety standards including ISO, CE, and UL certifications.

faq.question: What is your warranty policy?
faq.answer: We offer comprehensive warranties ranging from 2-5 years depending on the product category. Specific warranty information is provided with each product.

faq.question: Do you offer custom solutions?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide customized solutions for specific requirements. Contact our technical team for detailed discussions about your needs.
